extracted_information: Claim Titan is a claims management software (CRM) tailored for property insurance claims, designed to organize client data, track claims, and reduce administration overhead. It offers comprehensive features for managing claims from start to finish, including activity tracking, settlement management, and configurable workflows. The platform is accessible across multiple devices (desktop, tablet, mobile) via a web browser and emphasizes data privacy. It also provides automation capabilities and client portals.

features.name: Claims Management & Tracking
features.description: Organize client data, track claims effectively, manage administration overhead. Track claim objectives and progress.

features.name: Communication & Notifications
features.description: Review recent updates, log emails automatically, receive immediate notifications for urgent issues.

features.name: Settlement & Payment Management
features.description: Record claim settlements, track recovered totals, record payment status (on the way/received), automatic calculation of contract fees, commission payouts, and referrals.

features.name: Configurability
features.description: Designed to be highly configurable to fit existing workflows and tailor default settings to specific company needs.

features.name: Organized Workflow
features.description: Everything needed to settle a claim is in one location.

features.name: Files & Media Uploads
features.description: Upload files, documents, videos, and other media for claims.

features.name: Contacts & Personnel Management
features.description: Maintain a searchable list of contacts for claims, properties, and insurance companies.

features.name: Calendar
features.description: Schedule inspections, events, and meetings with an integrated calendar.

features.name: Document Templating
features.description: Generate repeatable documents using templates and dynamically insert claim data.

features.name: Reporting
features.description: Download and create custom reports with important claim data.

features.name: Client & Vendor Portals
features.description: Provide custom portals for clients and vendors to view claim information, share selected details, and receive updates, reducing communication overhead.

features.name: Intelligent Automation
features.description: Eliminate time-consuming 'busy work' by automating repetitive tasks, documents, and procedures using template documents and powerful automations to save time and labor costs.
